title: Nepenthes, or The vertues of tabacco by William Barclay Mr. of Art, and Doctor of Physicke
author: Barclay, William, 1570?-1630?
publisher: Printed by Andro Hart, and are to be sold at his shop on the north side of the high street, a litle beneath the Crosse,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
